action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. Starting from the top left corner and going row by row: the first row has an X in the first and last positions; the second row has an X in the first and fourth positions; the third row has three Xs in the first, second, and third positions; the fourth row has an X in the first and fourth positions; the fifth row has an X in the first and last positions. All other positions are blank.
continue
